summary: The Healthcare Enhancement And Learning Through Harnessing Artificial Intelligence Act (HEALTH AI Act) directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a grant program. This program will fund research on the use of generative artificial intelligence in healthcare. The research aims to improve various aspects of healthcare, including documentation, claims processing, customer service, and overall efficiency. Priority is given to projects that encourage AI adoption, workforce development, address disparities, and improve care for underserved populations.
